runYourAgency: Run your agency, in one place
straightforwardPricing: Our straightforward pricing plans are tailored to meet your needs. If you are not
straightforwardPricing2: ready to commit youcan get started for free.
thisActionCannotBeUndon: This action cannot be undon. This will delete the subaccount and all data related to the subaccount.
followStepsBellowToGetAccount: Follow the steps below to get your account setup.
saveWebsiteAsShortcut: Save the website as a shortcut on your mobile device
connectYourStripeAccountToAcceptPayments: Connect your stripe account to accept payments and see your dashboard.
totalRenevueGeneratedAsStripeDashboard: Total revenue generated as reflected in your stripe dashboard.
thisIsHowMuchYouCanClose: This is how much you can close
reflectsTheNumberOfSubAccountsYouOwnAndM: Reflects the number of sub accounts you own and manage.
agencyGoalDescription: Reflects the number of sub accounts you want to own and manage.
deleteUserConfMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user and related data.
name: Name
showYourCreativity: Show your creativity! You can customize every component as you like.
youCanDragAndDrop: You can drag and drop components on the canvas
heading: Heading
selectTheProductsYouWantToSell: Select the products and services you wish to sell on this funnel. You can sell one time and recurring products too.
createNewPageToViewPageSettings: Create a page to view page settings.
followTheStepsBelowToGetYourAccount: Follow the steps below to get your account setup correctly.
connectYourStripeAccountMessageSubaccoun: Connect your stripe account to accept payments. Stripe is used to run payouts.
totalVisitsInFunnels: Total page visits across all funnels. Hover over to get more details on funnel page performance.
deleteLaneConfigMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your pipeline and remove the data from our servers.
deletePipelineConfigMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this pipeline and remove the data from our servers.
deleteTicketConfigMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this ticket and remove the data from our servers.
letsCreateAnAgencyForYourBusiness: Lets create an agency for you business. You can edit agency settings later from the agency settings tab.
turninigOnWhiteLabelAgency: Turning on whilelabel mode will show your agency logo to all sub accounts by default. You can overwrite this functionality through sub account settings.
createAGoalDescription: âœ¨ Create a goal for your agency. As your business grows your goals grow too so dont forget to set the bar higher!
dangerZoneMessage: Deleting your agency cannpt be undone. This will also delete all sub accounts and all data related to your sub accounts. Sub accounts will no longer have access to funnels, contacts etc.
deleteAgencyConfMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the Agency account and all related sub accounts.
contactInfoDesc: You can assign tickets to contacts and set a value for each contact in the ticket.
funnelPageDesc: Funnel pages are flow in the order they are created by default. You can move them around to change their order.
invitationDesc: An invitation will be sent to the user. Users who already have an invitation sent out to their email, will not receive another invitation.
pleaseEnterFileDetails: Please enter the details for your file
userPermissionsDesc: You can give Sub Account access to team member by turning on access control for each Sub Account. This is only visible to agency owners
totalValueOfAllTickets: Total value of all tickets in the given pipeline except the last lane. Your last lane is considered your closing lane in every pipeline.
deleteTagConfMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your the tag and remove it from our servers.
deleteFileConfMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this file? All subaccount using this file will no longer have access to it!
pleaseContactToGetAccess: Please contact support or your agency owner to get access
